DOC.brief_summary: The purpose potential research study participant registry keep potential research subject inform future research study may meet criterion enrollment . The purpose study also assist current future clinical trial recruitment subject .
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : Subjects self identify via UCDMC Dermatology website complete survey regard interest learning future dermatology clinical research project . Subjects provide contact information check list potential topic interest . Procedures : Potential participant find link UCDMC Dermatology website registry . The potential participant read information registry . If wish additional information , follow link potential research registry consent form . At stage , potential participant may answer , `` '' consent form redirect back Clinical trial website . If answer , `` yes '' link registry questionnaire . The potential subject would decide want participate registry information want provide . The Clinical Research Coordinators would contact potential study participant see meet eligibility criterion current study .
DOC.criteria: Over 18 year age Under 18 year age
